main event: A bright, glowing object was observed in Newport, Arkansas, on July 16, 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a half dollar., The sighting lasted for a very brief duration of 10 minutes., The object suddenly disappeared to the east., Possible explanations included meteor, balloon, or aircraft., The report indicated that the description has all the characteristics of a meteor.
witness description: Radar operator from 723 ACWRON, reported as reliable sighting
